1.query: SELECT P.ProductName, P.Price, COUNT(OD.OrderID) AS NumberOfOrders FROM Products P JOIN OrderDetails OD ON P.ProductID = OD.ProductID GROUP BY P.ProductName, P.Price ORDER BY NumberOfOrders DESC LIMIT 10;
1.title: Relationship between Product Price and Number of Orders

2.query: SELECT C.Country, COUNT(O.OrderID) AS NumberOfOrders FROM Orders O JOIN Customers C ON O.CustomerID = C.CustomerID GROUP BY C.Country ORDER BY NumberOfOrders DESC LIMIT 10
2.title: Proportion of Sales by Country
